channel.title: Billy Vs. SNAKEMAN Wiki - new forum threads
channel.description: Threads in forums of the site "Billy Vs. SNAKEMAN Wiki" - Be the Ultimate Ninja.

item.title: Other newbies at online casinos?
item.content:encoded: Hi! Are there others who have just entered the world of online casinos? Felt like I needed something new and this has been my latest hobby. Any suggestions on how to hit the jackpots? What are the best new Finnish casinos for this? Thanks.

item.title: Ever tried slots and card games online?
item.content:encoded:
Looking for other options other than RPG games, but not as exhausting as RPG.

Was recommended online card games and slots. Been on it for a month now. Any other BVvS players who're into this as well?

item.title: シャネル 偽物
item.content:encoded: お札入れもカードスロットを添えたシャネル財布コピーは、実用性が印象的。ブランド 通販 店 そんなシャネルの魅力ともいえるデザインを描いたシャネルの三折り長財布コピーが発売した。シャネル 偽物 ジェットブラックの人気財布の内側はもちろん上質。

item.title: Rail Village nearing goal
item.description: Rail Village needs a few more ninjas
item.content:encoded:
Hi there!

Rail Village is currently about 20 ninjas away from our goal of exploding.

We have daily kaiju! We are fighting major kaiju now. We have zombjas. We have free stuff for newcomers. I've been giving out RP when I get the chance.

Yes, we can bingo people now.

Remember, you don't have to be active to help an Impossible Mission village. You can be idle and still reap the rewards!

Come join us!

item.title: Rail Village!
item.description: Rail Village is recruiting
item.content:encoded:
Rail Village needs ninjas!

We are an Impossible Mission village. Need Survived the Impossible? Help us grow and blow up!

If you already have Survived the Impossible, you can still help :) You can get free stuff from the storehouse, plus every new ninja helps make our village a better place.

We have tacos! Lots of tacos. And other useful stuff, while supplies last.

Thank you!

item.title: スーパーコピー
item.wikidot:authorName: ブランドスーパーコピー
item.content:encoded: チップの表面からいくつかの重要なチップの部品を見て、表面、添え板を並べている上で比較的見やすいのたとえば：アンチ・ショック器。異なる商店があって、等級も異なって、低級でよくあったのは三角形の物のアンチ・ショック器を使って、うそが会ったのを表すのは比較的多いです。良いのはINCBLOCのを使って、高級な腕時計は普通はKIFアンチ・ショック器を使って、たとえばロレックスROLEX、バセロン・コンスタンチン、パテック・フィリップは、彼らが好きで、注意深くあなたを観察して発見して、たとえおなじなチップを使うのですとしても、アンチ・ショック器の規格も行くのが異なりました.たとえばオメガOMEGAと帝陀TUDORはすべてETA2892チップを使って、しかしTUDORはKIFを使って、はINCBLOCを使って、高級な腕時計は高級な伝統の方法があって、通常KIFアンチ・ショック器はウォーム式の精度と構造(“オーストリアが特にこれを垂れる”)を調整して組み合わせて、高級な腕時計のチップの標識、最も最低限度はえこひいきのルーマニア打つ微調整する機関を使うのです。

item.title: Anti-Spoiler Measures?
item.description: A suggestion regarding Quest pages.
item.content:encoded:
Just as a thought, perhaps on Quest pages we could list everything needed to complete the Quest at the top of the page? I know for me it is a pain trying to scroll through and check the requirements without reading all the text and turning the actual Quest into tedium.
(I would, of course, be willing to do much of the work in adding such a thing to extant pages.)

item.title: Email Notifications
item.content:encoded: I want to change daily notifications, so that instead of getting emails from EACH AND EVERY CHANGE, i get one a day instead. item.title: The Bingo page
item.description: Page for anyone that needs to be bingo'ed with a note page
item.content:encoded:
Ok people, here's how it works.
You place you in-game name, village, season and lvl here when you ask for a bingo.
Once you answered the bingo request and bingo'ed the target you reply to the request by leaving a message including in-game name and village.

And to make the first request.:
I'm requesting a bingo by note page on my character Glennos of Keyblades Village Lvl 73 S3

item.title: How long after my BvS-account gets removed?
item.content:encoded:
Question is in the thread title: 'How long after my BvS-account gets removed?'

I ask this because I'm losing a bit of interest in Billy but I want to keep my account for when I want to play again. If it get's deleted after a month of idling I would only have to log in once a month instead of a day, which is what I do right now.

item.title: Ninja Kitty's special ability
item.description: extra ability when at max lvl 100
item.content:encoded:
I leveled Ninja Kitty to lvl100 yesterday, but didn't see the extra "100lvl max" ability until after dayroll today.
The 100 max lvl ability for Ninja Kitty is

+5 Stamina per Kaiju Attack

So when looking on your main page, and you mouse over Ninja Kitty in your Current Bonuses, it will say
+20% Kaiju Damage, +5 Stamina per Kaiju Attack

item.title: Rare Missions?
item.description: Catch a Legendary Spy and Time to Kill really not rare?
item.content:encoded:
Basically I'm asking about Catch a Legendary Spy (listed as A-Rank Genjutsu) and Time to Kill (listed as Monochrome Genjustu). I spent over a hundred smokebombs on the relevant Genjusu mission stacks, trying to get these missions to show up, with no success, but was able to get both within 10 smokebombs each after switching to general.

I realize this is a very small sample size, so has anyone managed to get these missions to show up without using General missions? And if so, was it pre-recode?

item.title: How do we handle the post-Look change?
item.content:encoded: Add in a new category of missions, the way we did for Inner Wasteland? Add the missions to the appropriate categories and put "Have not completed The Look" and "Have completed The Look" in the content? Even ignoring casually spoiling the content (I don't care what happens if you click on it, but if you're just looking at the Missions page, you shouldn't have your game experience spoiled), it's kind of a complex little situation to handle.

item.title: Welcome to the Jungle!
item.content:encoded:
Jungle Missions are now added to the game (and the wiki), but they still need to be spaded out completely. Got the basics added in, but I don't know whether or not any of the missions are rare, or if any of those ones without hidden content actually do have something. It's possible, if unlikely, that they give content at a higher crank, or are RedEye only, or something else I'm not testing. And, of course, we need all the mission texts, difficulties, and results. Will put in what I have already.

Also, we need to add in the Workshop, and add Jungle to the top bar.

item.title: How does the Worldcracker work?
item.content:encoded: From what I can tell from the wiki, You Unleash on day 1 and it activates on day 2. Worldkai that hit Crippled on day 2 would then give emblems for every rank to everyone in your village on day 3, regardless of whether they fought or how high a rank a person got. Am I wrong?

item.title: Doujutsu AP items/jutsu/allies

I wanted to level my Doujutsu, which is rather low.
But I was wondering if there were any items or jutsu's or allies that could make the leveling go faster. I already checked the Allies page and found none, but perhaps I missed something.

Anything you know is appreciated.

item.title: goal to get item in League of Legends named after Billy Vs. Snakeman
item.description: In League of Legends the reward for getting 1000 referrals is naming an in-game content item. I want to name an item in honor of BvS.
item.content:encoded:
First off here is the link for my referral page.

http://signup.leagueoflegends.com/?ref=4db02e22c11a4251158774

Its a free to play game that is fun whether or not you want to help with the item naming, all you have to do for the referral to count is reach lvl 5, which is not very hard.

When I reach 1000 referrals I will name an item after whatever the most voted BvS item is that appears in this thread.

I want to do this as a thank you to McMasters for making BvS, and as a way to further promote his game. I love playing this as much as LoL and hope that others will be able to enjoy both games as much as I do.

I will also update everyone periodically on the progress of this endeavor.

Thank you, and wish me luck.
